name: Poppy Playtime 2D (CHAPTER 1)
description:
Poppy Playtime 2D (CHAPTER 1)
You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.
Instructions: Move with WASD and arrow keys or move the joystick When in the power room, click and HOLD your mouse and move down. Collect a grab pack and open doors by clicking on the bio-metric lock (hand print) Click on the power generator which will make the grab pack glow and make it touch the pillars to bring back electricity and to unlock doors sometimes You can also move some objects with the grab pack (just for fun, they should not affect the game in any way) Your goal is to collect THE doll....
Walkthrough: If you are stuck/ don't know what to do next, here's a walkthrough for you: When you spawn, go to the left room and enter the code- red, yellow, pink and green Collect the VHS tape and insert it in the tv and watch the animation :) Collect the grab pack and open the door just above the spawn point Enter the next room and find... a huge blue monster! Relax, it's just a mannequin...maybe.... Go to the left room and touch the power generator and walk down to touch the pillars (which look like huge giant dots). Then, the power comes back! Return to the room with the mannequin and what? He's gone? Maybe it wasn't just a mannequin... Don't be afraid and go to the room towards your right Don't get scared by steam! Walk into the room with a conveyor belt and a weird colorful thing. Pick all these things (batteries) and insert it into a board below the conveyor belt After, you have inserted all batteries, the red hand emerges from the conveyor belt. Collect it and open the next door Steam again? Go to the room with the generator. Again, click on the generator and touch the pillars and open the next gate Then comes the production room! Just click on the red button labelled 'switch on' and the machines will make a toy for you! (It may take some time) Deposit the toy on the right side and enter the room What do you see? It's that blue monster! run from it (I hope it's not too scary) You can see that a door automatically opens on the top. Enter the vents through it. Find your way outside. It then steps on the fragile glass and falls down...Phew! Here's the poppy flower! Enter the house. It's a little creepy..... Then, enter the red room and open the doll's case and you win!!!
